Items.Details: Generates a new .NET app project within the Nx workspace.
Generates a new .NET library project within the Nx workspace.
Generates a new data library project within the Nx workspace.
Generates a new domain library project within the Nx workspace.
Generates a new feature library project within the Nx workspace.
Generates a new application layer project within the Nx workspace.
Runs the app using the 'serve' target.
Runs the app using the 'serve' target and a specific configuration.
Runs a build of the app using the 'build' target.
Runs a build of the app using the 'build' target and a specific configuration.
Runs the unit tests for the specified library.
Runs the 'publish' target for the specified library.
Runs the 'publish' target for the specified library with a specific configuration.
Rebuilds only the affected apps and libs.
Runs tests on only the affected apps and libs.
Runs lint checks on only the affected apps and libs.
Checks for formatting changes using Nx-aware lint checks.
Fixes/overwrites incorrect formatting using Nx-aware lint checks.
Lists available plugins for installation into the Nx workspace.
